typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		reviewerID as string,
		asin as string,
		reviewerName as string,
		helpful as string[],
		reviewText as string,
		overall as double,
		summary as string,
		unixReviewTime as string,
		reviewTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source
source select(mapColumn(
		reviewerID,
		asin,
		reviewerName,
		helpful,
		reviewText,
		overall,
		summary,
		unixReviewTime,
		reviewTime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
source derive(helpful = array(helpful)) ~> DerivedColumn1
